item.title: Finding bugs using IGT and git bisect
item.description: The first step to eliminate bugs is to find a way how to reproduce them consistently. Wait… what? Test suites are great for that, since they can simulate very specific behavior in a timely manner. IGT GPU Tools is a collection of tools for development and testing of the DRM drivers, and, as such, it can help us to find and reproduce bugs. I intend to help expand the AMDGPU tests’ list in my the GSoC project, so it made sense trying to run them right away.
